Biodiversity and open space BO1 – Green and blue infrastructure BO2 – Open spaces and the green grid networks BO3 – Water spaces BO4 – Biodiversity and access to nature BO5 – Urban greening BO6 – Play and recreation spaces BO7 – Food growing Introduction 18.1 Tower Hamlets has over 170 publicly accessible parks and open spaces which are a source of local pride, popular with residents and visitors to the borough.
